text: Manipur Statehood Day Women's Polo Tournament 2017 or 2nd Manipur Statehood Day Women's Polo Tournament is a Polo Tournament that was held in Imphal, Manipur. It was organised in Mapal Kangjeibung (Imphal Polo Ground), the oldest polo ground in the world. It is the first and the only women's polo tournament in India. United States won the trophy after defeating England by 9-3 goals. == Participants == * * * == References == Category:Polo competitions in Manipur Category:2017 in sports Category:2010s in Indian sport
title: Manipur Statehood Day Women's Polo Tournament 2017
